name: DRAGONFLY ONE-DESIGN
notes: Based on the Irish Dinghy Racing Association (IDRA) 14 Footer, some 40 Dragonflies were built on the River Deben, for the Waldringfield Sailing Club.  Built between 1940�s and 50�s, a number of the original Dragonflies are still actively raced at Waldringfield Sailing Club today but contact information is unknown at this time.
